content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Smith. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay while you are in Germany. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month. Is that possible?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Smith. However, I'm afraid that I cannot accept that price. The market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is much higher than 500 Euros per month. I would be happy to discuss a more reasonable rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay more. Is there any specific price that you are looking for?

I understand that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is higher than 500 Euros per month. I am willing to pay more if that is what you need.

I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure that I will be able to pay the rent on time.

I want to be on good terms with you, so please let me know if there is anything else I can do to help.

I understand that you may need some time to think about it, so please let me know if you need more time.

If you are not willing to negotiate, I will understand and I will find another apartment. Thank you for your time.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Smith. I appreciate your offer to pay more than the market rate. However, I am still not able to accept that price. I am looking for a rental price that is fair and reasonable for both of us.

I understand that you are dependable and responsible, and I appreciate your willingness to be on good terms with me. However, I am not able to negotiate at this time. I will need to consider your offer further and get back to you with a final decision.

Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
